main event: On 1 September 1959 at approximately 2015 PDT, two pilots observed a bright white light moving from east to west at a high speed over the Monterey Peninsula, California.
interesting points: The light initially appeared to be another aircraft and was about the intensity of a landing light., The pilots were flying at an altitude of 30,000 feet in a T-33 aircraft., A faint bluish-green glow formed into squares was seen trailing the light for a brief moment., The light disappeared for 3 to 5 seconds before reappearing., The object was under observation for a total of 3 to 5 minutes before disappearing over the Pacific Ocean.
sighted object: a bright white point of light with a greenish-blue glow
witness description: pilot officers, Maj. John W. Sherwood and 1st Lt. Roy C. Gill
